about_the_game:
Strip Brick Breaker Simulator is a game where you can replace images with your favorite characters and enjoy a strip brick-breaking experience.

♡♡♡ Custom Features ♡♡♡

♡ Replaceable Images
In addition to the regular image, you can set alternate images of the character looking embarrassed when all the blocks are about to be destroyed.

※As long as you have images for the blocks, it will work, so you can play it as a regular block breaker game.

♡ Character Names and Dialogues
You can register names and dialogues for characters.
The dialogues can be finely tuned, such as for "when the ball falls" or "when touched."

And more...

♡ Blackout Mode
You can black out the bricks with the blackout mode.
♡ Background Color Customization
You can change the background color.
♡ Optional Strip Mode
You can choose whether or not the character will be stripped after the game ends.
♡ Ball Physics Adjustment
You can adjust parameters like gravity and jump strength for the ball.
♡ Quick Save
You can register characters during gameplay, thanks to the quick save feature.
♡ Random Character Invocation
You can set it up to randomly call upon registered characters during gameplay.
♡ Adjustable Play Time
You can adjust the playtime, from a minimum of 1 minute to a maximum of 840 hours (more than a week!).

sample character data is also included!

Enjoy conversations with a variety of unique characters.

content_descriptors.notes: This game is a "strip-style brick breaker" that includes elements where the character's clothing is gradually removed. It does not contain explicit sexual depictions or extreme content such as sexual violence, non-consensual acts, drug or alcohol abuse, or self-harm. However, due to the nature of the game, it is intended for a mature audience.

Strip Brick Breaker Simulator is a game where you can replace images with your favorite characters and enjoy a strip brick-breaking experience.

♡♡♡ Custom Features ♡♡♡

♡ Replaceable Images
In addition to the regular image, you can set alternate images of the character looking embarrassed when all the blocks are about to be destroyed.

※As long as you have images for the blocks, it will work, so you can play it as a regular block breaker game.

♡ Character Names and Dialogues
You can register names and dialogues for characters.
The dialogues can be finely tuned, such as for "when the ball falls" or "when touched."

And more...

♡ Blackout Mode

♡ Optional Strip Mode

♡ Adjustable Play Time
You can adjust the playtime, from a minimum of 1 minute to a maximum of 840 hours (more than a week!).
